content: Senator McCain, I implore you to use your influence to counter balance the attacks the current president is waging against the press, immigrants, the judicial system, and our intelligence agencies. I believe you are a man of integrity and surely you see the danger the United States faces not only from foreign countries but from those Americans who seek to delegitimatize our institutions in an attempt to wrest power from the citizenry and consolidate authoritarian rule. The recent events remind me more and more of the actions of the Nixon administration in its final days.
